text: Bergün Filisur is a new municipality of the district Albula in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018 the former municipalities of Bergün/Bravuogn and Filisur merged to form the new municipality of Bergün Filisur.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 February 2018 == References == Category:Municipalities in Albula Category:2010s establishments in Switzerland Category:2018 establishments in Europe
title: Bergün Filisur
